name: Star Quest (campotech)
description: From the creator of Dungeon Warrior comes Star QuestIn this sci-fi RPG game you play the role as Casey. A princess who lost her kingdom and her  family by the hands of the evil King Classic. Casey now must travel through four planets of the Aeris Solar System to find a way to get to Classic and avenge the deaths of those who lost their lives to him. Along the way Casey will encounter 3 allies that will aid her in her quest and save the Aeris Solar System.
